‘Many came to comfort Martha and Mary.’  
Martha rushed to meet Jesus.  
‘Lord, if You had been here, my brother would not have died.’  
She hesitated, her voice trembling.  
‘But I know God will give You anything.’  
‘Your brother shall rise again,’ Jesus promised.  
‘I know he will rise on the last day,’ she replied.  
Jesus said, ‘I am the resurrection and the life.’  
‘Do you believe this?’  
‘Yea, Lord: I believe You are the Christ,’ she declared.  
Sonia read with conviction, her breath steady.  
Raskolnikov sat still, eyes averted, lost in thought.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Sonia reads a passage from the Bible about faith and resurrection, expressing her belief in Jesus as the Christ.
